clinicForBetterAccessibilityDesc: In clinics for better accessibility, insured persons who do not have a personal doctor (GP or Pediatrician) can choose their personal doctor (in case there is no available doctor or if the chosen personal doctor is permanently absent).
noResults: No doctor found based on your search criteria. Check if you have the right doctor type selected or zoom out the map.
doctorAvailability: Availability can be lower than 100% for doctors that work part time on preventive programs or in other units (e.g. dentist working with adults and youth).

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: In case of medical emergency you should contact emergency services or call 112.

pageNotFound.imageDescription: two traffic cones connected by yellow tape

reportError.title: Report error
reportError.text: Report error in doctor data and add the correct data or notes:
reportError.reportReceived: Thank you! We will look into it.

confirmation.title: Confirm
confirmation.warningText: Error reporting is not intended to order a review or consultation. To order appointment, contact your chosen doctor.
confirmation.text: Are you sure you want to report an error?
